_comment: Mobile app component documentation source data. This file is manually maintained and used to generate mobile-app-component-docs.json during the build process.
_instructions: To add a new mobile app component: 1) Add component data here following the existing structure, 2) Run 'npx gulp process-mobile-app-component-docs' to regenerate the processed file.

components.docs: A button component for React Native applications. View guidance for the Button component on the VA Design System

props.name: label
props.docs: Text appearing in the button

props.name: onPress
props.docs: Handler function called when button is pressed

props.name: buttonType
props.docs: Optional button variant. Defaults to primary if none specified. Options: Base, BaseSecondary, Destructive, Primary, Secondary

props.name: a11yHint
props.docs: Optional text to use as the accessibility hint

props.name: a11yLabel
props.docs: Optional accessibility override label

props.name: testID
props.docs: Optional test ID for test suites

props.name: testOnlyPressed
props.docs: Optional pressed state for test suites only

components.docs: An alert component for displaying important information to users in React Native applications

props.name: variant
props.docs: The type of alert to display. Options: info, success, warning, error

props.name: header
props.docs: Optional header text for the alert

props.name: description
props.docs: Main content text for the alert

props.name: expandable
props.docs: Whether the alert can be expanded to show additional content

props.name: testID
props.docs: Optional test ID for test suites
